statements: DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Quality' AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND metric_date = '2021-09-30';
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 AND metric_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supplier_orders WHERE order_id = 500 AND supplier_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND on_time_delivery < 0.9;
DELETE FROM supplier_orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND order_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM QualityMetrics WHERE defect_count > 5 AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supplier_ratings WHERE supplier_id = 2001 AND overall_rating < 3;
